Articles.Content: T\'was \'MAZING! I thought it\'d just look like a star, even through my 6 inch reflector, but it was one of the most awesome things I have ever seen. You could see the rings and everything, it looked like the attachment below. First time I\'ve seen it through my new telescope.

I saw saturn for the first time last week and was meserised. It is hard to comprehend how large and how far away that spot of light is yet im looking at it through a glass. It makes one wonder what kerbals think when they look at the mun!
